data.title: Evan Rodrigues - Men's Ice Hockey
data.meta_description: Evan Rodrigues (17) F  - Career Stats Profile                 AS A SENIOR IN 2014-15         Assistant Captain ... Second in the nation in assists per game (0.98)
data.text:
Career Stats Profile

AS A SENIOR IN 2014-15

Assistant Captain ... Second in the nation in assists per game (0.98) and in points (61) ... Most Outstanding Player of Northeast Regional ... All-Regional Team (NCAA Tournament) ... Hockey East All-Tournament Team ... Hockey East Second Team All-Star ... Hockey East All-Academic Team ... Tallied four points, including three goals, in NCAA Tournament ... Second in Hockey East play with 36 points, tied for fourth with 13 goals, third in assists with 23, and second in PP points with 13 ... Second in the Hockey East Tournament in assists (7) and tied for third in points with 8 (1g, 7a) ... Second on the team in points (61) and assists (40), and fourth in goals (21) ... Hockey East Player of the Month for January ... NCAA.com No. 1 Star of the Week (Feb. 10) ... NCAA.com No. 3 Star of the Week (Feb. 3) ... Two-time Hockey East Player of the Week (Feb. 2, Feb. 9) ... Nine-time Hockey East Top Performer ... Recorded three assists in a victory at UMass (Oct. 10) ... Scored a goal in a 6-4 win over the USA U-18 team (Oct. 18) ... Registered three points (1g, 2a) in a 4-1 victory at No. 8/9 Providence (Oct. 31) ... Recorded two assists in a 4-4 draw against UConn (Nov. 8) ... Scored two goals in a 5-2 win against No. 9 Colgate (Nov. 29) ... Recorded three assists in a 5-1 win at RPI (Dec. 13) ... Scored the game-tying goal against Union (Jan. 3) ... Recorded three (1g, 2a) points in a 6-1 win against Wisconsin (Jan. 10) ... Registered two assists in a 4-3 OT victory against No. 6 UMass Lowell (Jan. 18) ... Scored a goal and added an assist in a 4-2 win at No. 12 Vermont (Jan. 23) ... Picked up a goal and an assist, including the game-tying goal with 2:18 remaining in regulation, in a win at No. 12 Vermont (Jan. 24) ... Tied a school record with six assists in a 9-5 victory over Massachusetts (Jan. 30) ... Recorded two assists in a Beanpot semifinal victory over Harvard (Feb. 3) ... Recorded four points (3g, 1a), including his first career hat trick and 100th point as a Terrier, in a 5-2 win at No. 11/12 UMass Lowell (Feb. 6) ... Scored a goal in a 2-2 tie with Notre Dame (Feb. 20) ... Recorded a hat trick against Northeastern (Feb. 27) ... Tallied five points (1g, 4a) in a 2-game sweep of Merrimack in the Hockey East quarterfinals (Mar. 13-14) ... Recorded two assists in the Hockey East semifinal victory over UNH (Mar. 20) ... Picked up an assist in the Hockey East championship game (Mar. 21) ... Scored a goal and added an assist in the NCAA Northeast Regional Semifinal win against Yale (Mar. 27) ... Scored two goals, including the game winner with 2:24 left in regulation, in the NCAA Northeast Regional Final against Minnesota Duluth (Mar. 28).

AS A JUNIOR IN 2013-14

Named to Hockey East All-Academic Team ... Played in 31 games ... Finished second on the team in shots with 94 ... Recorded a goal and an assist in the Terriers season-opening victory over UMass (Oct. 11) ... Named a Hockey East Top Performer (Oct. 14) ... Scored the Terriers lone goal in a 1-1 tie against Merrimack (Dec. 7) ... Scored the first goal of the Beanpot consolation game and added an assist against Harvard (Feb. 10) ...Registered a goal and an assist at UNH (Feb. 14).

AS A SOPHOMORE IN 2012-13

Recipient of Paul Hines Award, given to Most Improved Player in New England ... Named a Hockey East Second Team All-Star ... Appeared in 38 games for the Terriers and finished tied for third in points ... Led team in plus-minus (+15) ... Collected a pair of assists in the season-opening victory against Providence ... Scored his first goal of the season during a 3-1 victory at Merrimack ... Named Hockey East Co-Player of the Week on Dec. 3 after recording two goals and an assist in a home-and-home series with No. 1 Boston College ... Recorded a 4-point game (2 goals, 2 assists) in a loss to Northeastern ... Scored two goals in a 3-2 victory at Providence ... Had 3 points (3 assists) in a weekend series at Maine ... Scored his first career shorthanded goal against Lowell on Feb. 23 ... Netted a goal and added a helper in a 5-2 win over Merrimack ...Recorded three assists in a weekend series with Vermont ... Recorded a goal and an assist in a 5-0 win over Northeastern ... Scored two goals in a 6-3 victory over No. 4 Boston College in the Hockey East semifinal ... Three-time Hockey East Top Performer (10/15, 1/21, 1/28).

AS A FRESHMAN IN 2011-12

Played in 36 games ... Totaled 12 points on two goals and 10 assists ... Had a three-game point streak (1g, 3a) snapped in NCAA Regionals against Minnesota ... Collected two assists against Maine on March 16 ... Scored goal in series-clinching win against New Hampshire on March 11 ... Picked up pair of assists at Vermont on Feb. 24 ... Tallied assist on Jan. 20 at Providence ... Scored at Northeastern on Jan. 13 ... Notched an assist in the Terriers' 4-1 win over New Hampshire on Nov. 19 ... Registered two assists for his first collegiate points on Oct. 29 against Massachusetts ... Recorded three shots in his first collegiate game against New Hampshire on Oct. 8.

BEFORE BOSTON UNIVERSITY

Played for Georgetown of the OJHL for two seasons and registered 105 points (41g, 64a) in 93 contests ... Led his team to the playoffs both seasons and advanced to the 2010-11 league semifinals ... Top scorer for Team Canada East at the 2010 World Junior A Challenge with seven points (3g, 4a) ... Named to the tournament's All-Star Team ... Member of OHF Atom `AAA', All-Ontario Peewee and Bantam championship squads while playing for the Toronto Marlboros program ... Played in the 2010 CJHL Top Prospects Tournament ... Started his minor hockey career with the York Toros ... Graduated from Michael PowerÂ·St. Joseph High School in Etobicoke.

PERSONAL

Born July 28, 1993 ... Son of Christine and Norbert Rodrigues ... His older brother, Paul, played hockey at Oswego State and was the 2013 Division III Player of the Year ... Enrolled in the School of Management, majoring in business administration and management.
